David Sunsly Mungoshi (30 Septemba 1949 -29 Ọgọst 2020) bụ onye Zimbabwean na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na'ede uri na onye nkuzi.
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1949 na Bulawayo, Zimbabwe ma na-asụ Shona, Ndebele na Bekee nke ọma
Ọ mụtara Zulu, nke yiri Ndebele, nke n'oge ahụ a na-ahụghị dịka asụsụ dị iche, n'ụlọ akwụkwọ.
N'afọ 1970, ọ malitere ịkụzi na St Annes Goto Primary School na Hwedza
Ọ lụrụ ọgụ na mmalite nke ọrụ edemede ya, ebe ụfọdụ kwenyere na ọ na-ede naanị n'ihi na nwanne ya nwoke, onye guzobere Charles Mungoshi, na-ede akwụkwọ, ma ọ bụ na nwanne ya dere ha

N'afọ 1975, ọ debanyere aha maka BA na Bekee na akụkọ ihe mere eme na Mahadum Rhodesia Mungoshi bụ onye nkuzi maka ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ndụ ya, ma kụzie na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche, gụnyere Mahadum Zimbabwe.
Mungoshi bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ma ruo n'afọ 2011 gosipụtara na ihe nkiri ncha Studio 263, yana ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi, The Postman, na ihe nkiri Secrets.
Ọ biri na Gweru mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká.
O meriri na National Arts Merit Awards nke afọ 2010  Outstanding Fiction Book maka The Fading Sun
Ọ nwụrụ n'abalị 29 ọnwa Ọgọst afọ 2020.
